text.jpText:
PR活動の一環で、WEBメディアの取材を
受けることになったカレンチャン。
相手の記者とは何やら因縁がある様子。
text.enText:
As part of a PR activity, Curren Chan 
was interviewed by the web media. 
The reporter and Curren-Chan seem 
to have some kind of history.

text.jpText:
実際、取材が始まってみると、
記者はカレンチャンの本音を暴こうと
失礼な質問を繰り返してくる。
text.enText:
In fact, when the interview began, the 
reporter repeatedly asked rude questions in 
an attempt to uncover Curren Chan's true 
intentions. The reporter repeatedly asked 
rude questions in an attempt to uncover 
Curren Chan's true intentions.

text.jpText:
しかしカレンチャンは、『レースは遊び』と
決めつけてきた記者の言葉をキッパリ否定。
その上でレースへの想いを真摯に語り――
text.enText:
However, Curren Chan categorically denied the 
reporter's assumption that "racing is just 
for fun. She then spoke sincerely about her 
thoughts on racing.

text.jpText:
最終的に記者を魅了し、カワイイと言わせる
鮮やかな手腕を見せつけた。
その結果、後日記事が公開されると……。
text.enText:
Finally, she showed a brilliant hand at 
charming the reporter and making her say 
kawaii. As a result, the article will be 
published at a later date at ……

text.jpText:
カレンチャンの想いは反響を呼び、
記者と同じく彼女の本気を疑っていた人々の
悪評をも覆すことに成功したのだった。
text.enText:
Curren Chan's thoughts were echoed by those 
who, like the journalist, had doubts about 
her intentions. The result was that 
Curren-Chan's thoughts and feelings were 
echoed by the press and those who had doubted 
her sincerity.
